infotexts.entitydescription.morbusine: A highly potent neurotoxin, which causes an eventual shutdown of lungs and muscles, greatly hindering movement.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyanide: A highly toxic chemical, which causes a rapid death once a sufficiently large dose has been administered.
infotexts.entitydescription.radiotoxin: A highly radioactive substance, which causes radiation sickness and eventual liquification of inner organs.
infotexts.entitydescription.sufforin: A stealthy neurotoxin, undetectable in early stages. Causes a loss of vision and in the end, death.
infotexts.sp.turret.AutoOperate.name: Auto Operate

infotexts.sp.turret.RandomAimMinTime.description: [Auto Operate] How often the turret should adjust the aim randomly instead of tracking the target perfectly? Minimum wait time, in seconds.
infotexts.sp.turret.RandomAimMaxTime.name: Random Aim Max Time
infotexts.sp.turret.RandomAimMaxTime.description: [Auto Operate] How often the turret should adjust the aim randomly instead of tracking the target perfectly? Maximum wait time, in seconds.
